page.title: 11Education
page.content: {AN INTERVIEW WITH A RETIRED TEACHER {FROM NATIONAL SCHOOL, TODMORDEN. We interviewed Mrs.Horne about the school 60 years ago.When she first came to the school,as a pupil,she was only 3 years old.There were 10 or 11 classes in the school,(now there are only 7). The children in Mrs.Hornes' time wore clogs and they had fun seeing who could make the most sparks.For sport they would play a game and do exercises.These would be,arms in,arms out,up,down,touch your shoulders and touch your toes.They did them standing on chairs. They all went home for dinner.Those pupils who could not afford a dinner got a ticket and went to a cafe to get potatoe pie. If anyone talked, when the teacher left the room, they all got the cane.
